name: Tavern Time
description:
Tavern Time is a university project, created for the brief "Gamify a mundane activity". In Tavern Time you play as a tavern owner, managing and running a fantasy tavern, while constantly being taunted and teased by the story, tales and rumours from all the tavern folk you serve. Wanting nothing but to get out there on your own awesome adventure you vow to make as much money as possible.  Feed off cheeky Imps that steal your tools or mighty Orcs and their mighty messes. Running your tavern doesn't look like its going to be so easy.

Control scheme

Movement: WASD or arrow keys

Interact: E

Drop: Q

Cycle Inventory: Spacebar
